titleStmt.title: An essay of a loyal brest in four copies of verses, viz. I. to His Majesty, Charles the 2d, II. to his two houses of Parliament, III. to his general, the Lord Monck, IV. to that his good angel, Madam Jane Lane / by William Fairebrother ...
titleStmt.author: Fairebrother, William, 1612 or 13-1681.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
